title: GitTogether Mumbai
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** Please register at **[gittogethers.github.io](http://gittogethers.github.io/)** by **12 PM IST on 26th June**. Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

Join us for this half-day meetup packed with insights, inspiration, and networking! Sharpen your tech skills and discover incredible open-source projects.

What to expect:

* **Tech Sessions**: Dive into the latest open-source technologies with talks by experienced developers. Expand your knowledge and toolkit!
* **Community Spotlight**: Discover a hidden gem! One lucky participant gets to showcase a cool open-source project they've built. Could it be you?

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Agenda**

* 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 10:00 AM to 10:10 AM: **git init (Welcome Note)**
* 10:10 AM to 10:40 AM: **Session 1** ([Call for Sessions](gh.io/cfs))
* 10:40 AM to 11:10 AM: **Session 2**
* 11:10 AM to 11:30 AM: **Break and Networking**
* 11:30 AM to 12:00 PM: **Community** **Spotlight** ([Submit for Spotlight](https://gh.io/spotlight))
* 12:00 PM to 12:45 PM: **Session 3**
* 12:45 PM to 1:00 PM: **git merge (Closing Note)**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: Saturday 28st June, 2025

**Time**: 9:30 AM to 1:00 PM IST

**Venue**: BookMyShow, Empressa 14 Western Express Highway, Sahar Rd, Andheri East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400099 ([Map Location](https://maps.app.goo.gl/qCB8dHDAoP8eEY3F7?g_st=aw))

For any queries, please write to us at [meetups@github.com](http://meetups@github.com/)

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**GitTogethers Call for Sessions** üì¢

Are you someone who loves to share your knowledge? Do you have a passion for AI, Developer Experience, or Security? [Submit your proposal here](https://gh.io/cfs) for upcoming GitTogether events!

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Community Spotlight** üí°

Are you passionate about open-source development and have a project you'd love to share? We're looking for developers like you for spotlight at our upcoming GitTogethers. [Submit your projects here](https://gh.io/spotlight).

title: GitTogether Hyderabad
description:
IMPORTANT: **Meetup RSVP is not considered as registration.** **Registrations are now closed for this event.** Confirmed participants will receive an email by the end of the same day. Only confirmed participants will be granted entry to the venue, and we are unable to make any exceptions. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation.

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

Join us for an exciting GitTogether workshop on **GitHub Copilot Agent Mode & AI Agents**!

* Explore how AI-powered agents act as coding teammates ‚Äî not just assistants. In this session, you'll learn how to use GitHub Copilot to **understand codebases**, **fix bugs**, **write tests**, and **automate tasks** like creating issues, commits, and pull requests.

We'll kick off with a short talk on AI agents, followed by a **hands-on workshop** where you'll build and interact with your own Copilot agent. Whether you're new to Copilot or exploring Agent Mode, this session will boost your productivity and developer skills.

**Important Note: Please bring your own laptop, as this will be a hands-on workshop with live coding and participation.**

üéØ Who should join? Developers, AI enthusiasts, and open source contributors

* Community Spotlight: Discover a hidden gem! One lucky participant gets to showcase a cool open-source project they've built. Could it be you?

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Agenda**

* 9:30 AM to 10:00 AM: **Registration and Networking**
* 10:00 AM to 10:10 AM: **git init (Welcome Note)**
* 10:10 AM to 11:00 AM: **Supercharging Dev Workflows with GitHub Copilot Agent Mode & AI Agents by** [Tanmaiyee Vadloori](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tanmaiyee-vadloori/)
* 11:00 AM to 11:20 AM: **Break and Networking**
* 11:20 AM to 12:45 PM: **Hands-on** **GitHub Copilot AI Agent Mode Workshop by** [Tanmaiyee Vadloori](https://www.linkedin.com/in/tanmaiyee-vadloori/)
* 12:45 PM to 1:00 PM: **git merge (Closing Note)**

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**Date**: Saturday 14th June, 2025

**Time**: 9:30 AM to 1:00 PM IST

**Venue**: [WTC Shamshabad (Interim Office)](https://maps.app.goo.gl/XwTXFyxRY7rJRXiG6), Kapil Kavuri Hub, no. 144 Survey 37, Financial District, Nanakramguda, Telangana 500032

For any queries, please contact [Tanmaiyee Vadloori](https://github.com/Tanmaiyee-Vadloori), Community Volunteer at GitTogether Hyderabad or write to us at meetups@github.com

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

**GitTogethers Call for Sessions** üì¢

Are you someone who loves to share your knowledge? Do you have a passion for AI, Developer Experience, or Security?

We're calling for developers to submit their session proposals for upcoming GitTogether events! [Submit your proposal here](https://gh.io/cfs).

\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-

Are you passionate about open-source development and have a project you'd love to share? We're looking for developers like you for spotlight at our upcoming GitTogethers. [Submit your projects here](https://gh.io/spotlight).

description:
**GitTogether Fortaleza ‚Äî Junho2025**
**Data:** 14/06/2025
**Local:** o evento ser√° PRESENCIAL no espa√ßo da Universidade de Fortaleza.

**Palestras:**
**09h00 √†s 09:20:** Abertura
**09h20 √†s 10h00:** Primeira palestra ‚Äî *Da Zona de Conforto ao C√≥digo: Minha Transi√ß√£o de Carreira aos 40+* por *Marcos Aur√©lio*
**10h00 √†s 10h40:** Coffee Break
**10h40 √†s 11h20:** Segunda palestra ‚Äî *O impacto das comunidades na transi√ß√£o de carreira* por *Gleice Avelino*.
**11h20 √†s 12h00:** Mesa redonda com palestrantes e convidados.

**Mini bio dos pessoas palestrantes:**
**‚Äî NOME:** *Marcos Aur√©lio*
Desenvolvedor Front-end na Nubba tecnologia e √© exemplo vivo de que nunca √© tarde para recome√ßar. Iniciou sua jornada na tecnologia aos 40 anos e, com prop√≥sito e dedica√ß√£o, conquistou seu espa√ßo na √°rea em apenas dois anos.

Atua com foco em ReactJS, JavaScript, Node.js e outras tecnologias modernas, sempre valorizando o trabalho em equipe e o aprendizado cont√≠nuo.

**‚Äî NOME:** *Gleice Avelino*
Administradora formada em RH. Graduanda do curso de ADS. Membro e Volunt√°ria na Comunidade Tech Pyladies Fortaleza e House JS. Aluna do Projeto Gera√ß√£o Tech 2.0
